## Library.Alias type

A token value that serves as an alias to another token value

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type Alias<T extends DesignToken.Any, R extends Context<any>> = (context: R) => T | DesignToken.ValueByToken<T>;
```
**References:** [DesignToken.Any](./design-token-library.designtoken.any.md)<!-- -->, [Context](./design-token-library.library.context.md)<!-- -->, [DesignToken.ValueByToken](./design-token-library.designtoken.valuebytoken.md)
